bookinfo.title: CS4099 MajorSP Java Project Technical Documentation

affiliation.orgname: The University of St Andrews School of Computer Science

bookinfo.abstract: As part of the CS4099 Major Software Project module, a program called SearchSystem was developed that allowed the user to construct a Permutation Code using a list generated by a related GAP program. Two support programs were also created that allowed the user to validate the results of the SearchSystem. This document contains the following documentation for each of the aforementioned programs: Quick Guide, Installation Guide, User Guide, Tutorials and maintenance document.
